extendedInfo.description: AUTO SPEAK CLIPBOARDThis program will give you the ability to have the android device speak out the contents of the clip board using the Text-to-Speech (TTS) engine. The speech will automatically begin whenever you copy text to the clipboard from any application.No special Android permissions are needed with this application (no ads). If you like this app, please rate it or review it or both.TODO- add better iconsKnown Bugs- Text copied from the Chrome browser will speak twice.

reviews.title: Light and Fast
reviews.comment: the best clipboard text to speech . very fast , not laggy . nice job
reviews.author: Amir Hossein Navabi

reviews.title: Simple and greate
reviews.comment: Woks as described. I love it. Thank you very much. For giving it for free.
reviews.author: Prasath Mendis Appu
